articles.author: Mary Walrath-Holdridge
articles.title: Girl Scouts hit with lawsuit over alleged heavy metals, toxins in its cookies - USA TODAY
articles.description: Last month, a non-peer-reviewed study commissioned by Moms Across America alleged that Girl Scout Cookies had toxins in them.
articles.content:
• A New York woman filed a lawsuit against the Girl Scouts of America alleging their cookies contain harmful levels of heavy metals and pesticides.
